nodes.bodyText:
I think about something like return an error for specific member to the map to the value. Something like:
sponsor1Name -> password1
sponsor2Name -> ERROR: error when creating
sponsor3Name -> password3
sponsor4Name -> ERROR: error when creating

Then it would be on frondend to show these errors to user. What do you think @zlamalp ?
It is not standard behavior, need to be precisely defined in javadoc, but it should work much better than this.
I would start this message like "ERROR: " + message.

commit.message:
Added createSponsoredMembers

- added new method to create multiple sponsored members in vo using one sponsor with generated passwords which are returned with logins in map, if there is some exception thrown during creation of members, already created members are in exception message
- also added tests and changed DummyPasswordManagerModule to return some random password
